welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kerava, Finland! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere, rich history, and beautiful natural surroundings, we hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that our city has to offer. Happy exploring!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-malmi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Helsinki-malmi Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
